I'm not a n00b or anything, but I was wondering if anyone else may have any information on what I had encountered.  I haven't updated the dash on my xbox yet, but when I pop in the game for HP, it prompts me that the game needs to update my console with a 4 MB update.  I have never said ok.  Anyone know what it is?  Can I install it and still play?

Okay, so I went ahead and said yes to the update.  Just in case anyone else is wondering the same thing I was --

The update was for the new dashboard that hadn't been downloaded.  Apparently, Microsoft has embedded the update into this particular game to force you to update before you play it.  I updated the system via the game, and I was still able to play it afterwards.

Good job on the great upload!
